name: gonadotropin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hormone made by the body that is used in reproduction and can be produced chemically and used in fertility treatment: Some doctors refuse to use gonadotropins and artificial insemination in younger women. Ovulation was induced by two injections of gonadotrophin.
More examplesFewer examplesIn females, leuprolide suppresses ovarian estrogen and androgen production principally by inhibiting pituitary gonadotropin release.a medication that prevents Alzheimer's by decreasing the production of or function of gonadotropins The first pregnancies in women receiving its gonadotrophin hormone treatment attracted much publicity.
